maqras.text: Dictus Et vos turn into rocks iron

Et vos turn into any generis de creation ut vos deem impossible They tunc dictus Qui bring nos back Dictus Unus created vos in the 1 locus, They tunc shake their heads dictus When testimentum est? Dictus est closer than vos think
Feria He summons vos vos respond de praising Eum vos tunc realize ut vos extremum in hoc vita short dum
Tell My servus treat each alius bonus possible moris devil semper try drive wedge them! Surely devil est vir ardent enemy
Tuus Dominus knows vos bene! His knowledge He shower vos cum mercy, He requite vos. Nos non send vos est their advocate
Tuus Dominus est bene knower de everyone in caelum terra. Prout hoc knowledge nos preferred some prophets others. Pro example nos dedit David Psalms
Dictus Implore whatever idols vos set Eum. They non habet power relieve tuus afflictions nor potuit they prevent them
Et idols they implore seeking via means their Dominus. They pray His mercy fear His retribution. Surely retribution tuus Dominus est dreadful
ibi non est community nos non annihilate Feria Resurrection inflict severe retribution them! Hoc iam scripsit book
Quod stopped nos ex sending miracles est ut proximus generations rejected them! Pro example nos showed Thamoud camel profound (miracle) they transgressed it Nos sent miracles unus instill reverence

Nos informed vos ut tuus Dominus fully controls people nos rendered vision ut nos showed vos test people tree est accursed Quran! Nos showed them solid proofs instill reverence them hoc unus augmented their defiance
When nos dictus to angels, Fall prostrate Adam they fell prostrate Satan. He dictus ego prostrate 1 Vos Shall created mud
He dictus Abinde Vos honored eum me Vos respite me Feria Resurrection ego possess totus his descendants ut few
He dictus Tunc iit; vos those subsequentis vos finis Hell tuus requital; equitable requital
Vos entice them tuus voice mobilize totus tuus forces totus tuus vir them share in their moneta infans promise them! Anything devil promises est non multus than illusion
Prout pro My servus vos non habet power them. Tuus Dominus suffices advocate
Tuus Dominus est Unus causa ships float ocean ut vos seek His bounties! He est Merciful towards vos
Vos afflicted sea vos forget tuus idols sincerely implore Eum alone prout soon prout He saves vos shore vos revert Indeed human est est unappreciative
Vos guaranteed ut He habuit non causa terra shore swallow vos? Alias ut He non send vos tempest tunc vos non invenit protector
Vos guaranteed He habuit non return vos sea alias temporis, tunc send vos storm drowns vos tuus disbelief? Dodum hoc happens nos non dedit vos alias chance
